locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Export Journal for Index Copernicus International (ICI) and supply journal information for inclusion
Export Journal Data to Index Copernicus International
Export selected issues or a single issue into the ICI XML file.

For your journal's consideration in the ICI, register to get username and login, manage journal's passport, and submit the evaluation questionnaire in order to be indexed in the ICI journals master list database..
